TopicTitle: One minor and one major request

Articles.Content:
The simpler one: I always want to view the part list sorted by mass. Every time I return to the VAB/SPH I have to hit the Mass button at the top of the parts panel. I just wish that could be made a persistent choice.

The much harder one: Even with a big and high-res screen things can get really cluttered...

It would just be fantastic to be able to drag all the non-stock panels off this display onto another empty display. I have no idea whether something like that is even possible.

Crzyrndm was working on something along the lines of your second one but found it to be more difficult than initially expected, you can see the project here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126780-WIP-Multi-monitor-screen-space

Thank, RIC.

I've just taken a look at that mod. Does look as though he was trying to do exactly what I wanted but he got bogged down and it looks like he has given up on it for now.
